name: Shenhe
title: Lonesome Transcendence
description: An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Dawnstar Piercer
skills.description: Normal AttackPerforms up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.Charged AttackConsumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.Plunging AttackPlunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Spring Spirit Summoning
skills.description: The frosted dew, silvery and dense, shall exorcise all demons.Grants all nearby party members the Icy Quill effect and deals Cryo DMG in different ways based on whether it is pressed, the Icy Quill's effect lasts longer and can be triggered more times.When one Cryo DMG instance strikes multiple opponents, the effect is triggered multiple times based on the number of opponents hit. The number of times the effect is triggered is calculated independently for each party member with the Icy Quill.
skills.info: The power of the spirits is no falsehood. Burdened with her orders, the divine maiden hurries on!

skills.name: Divine Maiden's Deliverance
skills.description: Unleashes the power of the Talisman Spirit, allowing it to roam free in this plane, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.The Talisman Spirit then creates a field that decreases the Cryo RES and Physical RES of opponents within it. It also deals periodic Cryo DMG to opponents within the field.
skills.info: The way of the adepti is not defined only by the mysterious and fantastical. Only by observing the changes in the heavens and the earth, and understanding the laws of cause and effect in this realm, may its essence be understood.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Dawnstar Piercer
skills.description: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Spring Spirit Summoning
skills.description: The frosted dew, silvery and dense, shall exorcise all demons. Grants all nearby party members the Icy Quill effect and deals Cryo DMG in different ways based on whether it is pressed, the Icy Quill's effect lasts longer and can be triggered more times. When one Cryo DMG instance strikes multiple opponents, the effect is triggered multiple times based on the number of opponents hit. The number of times the effect is triggered is calculated independently for each party member with the Icy Quill.
skills.info: The power of the spirits is no falsehood. Burdened with her orders, the divine maiden hurries on!

skills.name: Divine Maiden's Deliverance
skills.description: Unleashes the power of the Talisman Spirit, allowing it to roam free in this plane, dealing AoE Cryo DMG. The Talisman Spirit then creates a field that decreases the Cryo RES and Physical RES of opponents within it. It also deals periodic Cryo DMG to opponents within the field.
skills.info: The way of the adepti is not defined only by the mysterious and fantastical. Only by observing the changes in the heavens and the earth, and understanding the laws of cause and effect in this realm, may its essence be understood.

passives.name: Deific Embrace
passives.description: An active character within the field created by Divine Maiden's Deliverance gains 15% Cryo DMG Bonus.

passives.name: Spirit Communion Seal
passives.description: After Shenhe uses Spring Spirit Summoning, she will grant all nearby party members the following effects:· Press: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by 15% for 10s.· Hold: Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG increased by 15% for 15s.

passives.name: Precise Comings and Goings
passives.description: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Liyue Expedition for 20 hours.

passives.name: Deific Embrace
passives.description: An active character within the field created by Divine Maiden's Deliverance gains 15% Cryo DMG Bonus.

passives.name: Spirit Communion Seal
passives.description: After Shenhe uses Spring Spirit Summoning, she will grant all nearby party members the following effects: · Press: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by 15% for 10s. · Hold: Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG increased by 15% for 15s.

passives.name: Precise Comings and Goings
passives.description: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Liyue Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: Clarity of Heart
constellations.description: Spring Spirit Summoning can be used 1 more time.

constellations.name: Centered Spirit
constellations.description: Divine Maiden's Deliverance lasts for 6 seconds longer. Active characters within the skill's field deal 15% increased Cryo CRIT DMG.

constellations.name: Seclusion
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Spring Spirit Summoning by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Insight
constellations.description: When characters under the effect of Icy Quill applied by Shenhe trigger its DMG Bonus effects, Shenhe will gain a Skyfrost Mantra stack:· When Shenhe uses Spring Spirit Summoning, she will consume all stacks of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing the DMG of that Spring Spirit Summoning by 5% for each stack consumed.· Max 50 stacks. Stacks last for 60s.

constellations.name: Divine Attainment
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Divine Maiden's Deliverance by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Mystical Abandon
constellations.description: When characters trigger Icy Quill's effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.

constellations.description: Spring Spirit Summoning can be used 1 more time.

Stacks last for 60s.

constellations.name: Divine Attainment
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Divine Maiden's Deliverance by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Mystical Abandon
constellations.description: When characters trigger Icy Quill's effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.

outfits.name: The World’s Shackles
outfits.description: Shenhe's outfit. These elegant garments have accompanied her through long years of training. The red ropes that surround her body are fetters and wards simultaneously.
